Class LatestStudentListUI

java.lang.Object
cop3330.ui.LatestStudentListUI
public class LatestStudentListUI extends Object
The LatestStudentListUI class provides a graphical user interface window for displaying, filtering, and managing a list of students.

This UI allows users to:

  • View a list of students in a table
  • Filter students by search query
  • Reset the applied filter
  • View all courses
  • Display detailed information and registered courses of a selected student
  • Add a new student
  • Save all changes to persistent storage

The UI uses a SimpleController to interact with student and course data. Components are arranged with the student table in the center and control buttons in the bottom panel.

The window is centered on the screen and exits the application when closed.

    Opens a LatestCourseListUI window showing the courses registered by the currently selected student in the table.

    Populates the JTable with student data from the provided model and embeds it in a JScrollPane added to the main frame.

    Resets any applied filter on the student list and reloads the full student data.

  • Constructor Details

    • LatestStudentListUI

      public LatestStudentListUI(SimpleController controller)
      Constructs the UI window displaying all students. Sets up buttons for filtering, resetting, viewing courses, showing student details, adding students, and saving data. The window is centered on the screen.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller instance for data access

  • Method Details

    • openCourseListUI

      private void openCourseListUI(ActionEvent e)
      Opens a LatestCourseListUI window showing the courses registered by the currently selected student in the table.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user

    • displayStudentInfo

      private void displayStudentInfo(ActionEvent e)
      Displays detailed information about the currently selected student in a message dialog.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user

    • filterStudents

      private void filterStudents(ActionEvent e)
      Prompts the user for a search query and filters the student list table accordingly. Disables the filter button and enables the reset button upon successful filtering.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user

    • resetFilter

      private void resetFilter(ActionEvent e)
      Resets any applied filter on the student list and reloads the full student data. Enables the filter button and disables the reset button.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user

    • showCourses

      private void showCourses(ActionEvent e)
      Opens a LatestCourseListUI window displaying all courses.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user

    • populateTable

      private void populateTable(StudentListModel model)
      Populates the JTable with student data from the provided model and embeds it in a JScrollPane added to the main frame.
      Parameters:
      model - the StudentListModel containing student data

    • addStudent

      private void addStudent(ActionEvent e)
      Prompts the user to enter information for a new student and adds the student through the controller.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user

    • saveData

      private void saveData(ActionEvent e)
      Saves all changes through the controller and informs the user of the result.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event triggered by the user
